readable.title: 2479652566_8f9fac8af5
readable.content: A little girl is sitting on the counter dangling one foot in the sink whilst holding a dish jet washer . A little girl plays with a faucet . A little girl wearing sunglasses puts her feet into the kitchen sink . A young , barefoot girl in red sunglasses plays in a sink . A young girl wearing red sunglasses sits near a sink and holds the faucet .
